words.prompt: If you _____________ in doing something, you have met your goal or achieved the desired result.
If people _____________, they have the same opinion about something.
When you _____________ something, you read, practice, or think about it so that you can learn it.
_____________ are people who have done brave or good things.
If something is _____________, it means it is difficult and takes effort to do.
If you _____________ something, you find it or find out about it.
If you have an _____________ in something, you like it and want to learn more about it.
When you _____________ in a play or movie, you act in it.
If something has _____________, people chose it over something else.
Your _____________ are the things the law says you can do or have.
_____________ are important problems or topics that people are talking or arguing about.
A _____________ is a person who has won a contest.
If you _____________ something, you decided it.
_____________ are things you tell people you will definitely do.
If you have a _____________ to do something, it is your duty to do it.
If you _____________ to do something, you offered to do it.
When things are _____________, they are brought or joined together.
_____________ are directions that tell how to do something or what is allowed.
_____________ is the story of what happened in the past.
If something _____________ happens, it happens after a long time.
When you _____________ something, you make or shape it.
If you _____________, you spoke or shouted suddenly because you were excited or upset.
If something is _____________, it is for all people to use or visit.
_____________ are people who write stories, books, and articles.
